# ClaudeKit Documentation

> AI Development Team - Best Claude Code starter kits for solo builders with 60+ specialized agents, 100+ slash commands, and 90+ built-in skills

ClaudeKit is a comprehensive toolkit built on Claude Code, providing AI agents, slash commands, and built-in skills to accelerate software development. This documentation covers everything from installation to advanced workflows across Engineer, Marketing, and CLI kits.

## Getting Started

Essential guides to begin using ClaudeKit:

- [Getting Started Hub](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/getting-started): Complete onboarding guide
- [Introduction](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/getting-started/introduction): Overview and value proposition
- [Why ClaudeKit](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/getting-started/why-claudekit): Benefits and use cases
- [Concepts](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/getting-started/concepts): Core concepts and architecture
- [Installation](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/getting-started/installation): Setup instructions
- [Quick Start](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/getting-started/quick-start): Ship your first feature in 6 minutes
- [Upgrade Guide](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/getting-started/upgrade-guide): Migration from previous versions
- [Cheatsheet](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/getting-started/cheatsheet): Command reference

## CLI Reference

Command-line interface documentation:

- [CLI Overview](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/cli): CLI capabilities and reference
- [Installation](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/cli/installation): CLI setup and requirements
- [ck new](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/cli/new): Create new projects with templates
- [ck init](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/cli/init): Initialize ClaudeKit in existing projects
- [ck update](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/cli/update): Update ClaudeKit components
- [ck uninstall](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/cli/uninstall): Remove ClaudeKit
- [ck doctor](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/cli/doctor): Diagnose and fix issues
- [ck versions](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/cli/versions): Version management
- [Configuration](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/cli/configuration): CLI configuration options

## Engineer Kit

Complete documentation for the Engineer toolkit with 18 agents, 66 commands, and 49 skills:

- [Engineer Overview](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer): Engineer kit introduction

### Engineer Agents

Specialized agents for software development:

- [Agents Overview](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/agents): Complete agent reference

#### Planning & Research
- [planner](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/agents/planner): Research and implementation planning
- [researcher](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/agents/researcher): Best practices research with parallel search
- [brainstormer](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/agents/brainstormer): Solution exploration and ideation
- [scout](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/agents/scout): Codebase navigation and file discovery
- [scout-external](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/agents/scout-external): External codebase exploration

#### Development & Quality
- [tester](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/agents/tester): Testing and validation
- [code-reviewer](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/agents/code-reviewer): Code quality and security review
- [debugger](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/agents/debugger): Root cause analysis and bug fixing
- [fullstack-developer](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/agents/fullstack-developer): Full-stack implementation

#### Design & Content
- [ui-ux-designer](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/agents/ui-ux-designer): Interface design and wireframes
- [copywriter](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/agents/copywriter): Conversion-focused content creation

#### Infrastructure & Management
- [database-admin](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/agents/database-admin): Database optimization and administration
- [git-manager](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/agents/git-manager): Version control and commits
- [docs-manager](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/agents/docs-manager): Documentation management
- [project-manager](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/agents/project-manager): Progress tracking and coordination
- [journal-writer](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/agents/journal-writer): Decision documentation
- [mcp-manager](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/agents/mcp-manager): MCP server management

### Engineer Commands

- [Commands Overview](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands): Complete command reference

#### Core Commands
- [/cook](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/cook): End-to-end feature implementation
- [/cook:auto](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/cook-auto): Automated cooking workflow
- [/cook:auto-fast](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/cook-auto-fast): Fast automated cooking
- [/cook:auto-parallel](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/cook-auto-parallel): Parallel automated cooking
- [/code](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/code): Quality-gated implementation
- [/code:no-test](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/code-no-test): Implementation without tests
- [/code:parallel](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/code-parallel): Parallel code execution
- [/bootstrap](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/bootstrap): Start new projects
- [/bootstrap:auto](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/bootstrap-auto): Automated bootstrapping
- [/bootstrap:auto-fast](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/bootstrap-auto-fast): Fast automated bootstrapping
- [/bootstrap:auto-parallel](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/bootstrap-auto-parallel): Parallel bootstrapping
- [/debug](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/debug): Systematic debugging
- [/journal](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/journal): Document decisions
- [/scout](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/scout): Explore codebase
- [/scout:ext](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/scout-ext): External exploration
- [/ask](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/ask): Technical questions
- [/test](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/test): Run tests
- [/brainstorm](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/brainstorm): Idea exploration
- [/review:codebase](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/review-codebase): Codebase review
- [/use-mcp](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/use-mcp): MCP tool usage
- [/watzup](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/watzup): Project status
- [/ck-help](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/core/ck-help): Get help

#### Fix Commands
- [Fix Overview](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/fix): Fix commands reference
- [/fix:hard](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/fix/hard): Complex bug fixing
- [/fix:fast](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/fix/fast): Quick fixes
- [/fix:parallel](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/fix/parallel): Parallel fixing
- [/fix:types](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/fix/types): TypeScript type errors
- [/fix:ui](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/fix/ui): UI issues
- [/fix:ci](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/fix/ci): CI/CD failures
- [/fix:logs](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/fix/logs): Log analysis
- [/fix:test](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/fix/test): Test failures

#### Design Commands
- [/design:good](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/design/good): High-quality UI design
- [/design:fast](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/design/fast): Quick design iterations
- [/design:3d](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/design/3d): 3D designs with Three.js
- [/design:screenshot](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/design/screenshot): Design from screenshots
- [/design:video](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/design/video): Design from videos
- [/design:describe](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/design/describe): Analyze designs

#### Content Commands
- [/content:good](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/content/good): High-quality copy
- [/content:fast](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/content/fast): Quick copy generation
- [/content:cro](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/content/cro): Conversion optimization
- [/content:enhance](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/content/enhance): Improve existing copy

#### Documentation Commands
- [/docs:init](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/docs-cmd/init): Initialize documentation
- [/docs:update](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/docs-cmd/update): Update documentation
- [/docs:summarize](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/docs-cmd/summarize): Generate summary

#### Git Commands
- [/git:cm](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/git/cm): Create commits
- [/git:commit](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/git/commit): Conventional commits
- [/git:cp](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/git/cp): Commit and push
- [/git:commit-push](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/git/commit-push): Commit and push changes
- [/git:merge](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/git/merge): Merge branches
- [/git:pr](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/git/pull-request): Create pull requests

#### Plan Commands
- [Plan Overview](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/plan): Plan commands reference
- [/plan:two](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/plan/two): Two-approach planning
- [/plan:ci](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/plan/ci): CI/CD analysis
- [/plan:cro](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/plan/cro): CRO planning
- [/plan:fast](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/plan/fast): Quick planning
- [/plan:hard](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/plan/hard): Complex planning
- [/plan:parallel](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/plan/parallel): Parallel planning

#### Integration Commands
- [/integrate:polar](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/integrate/polar): Polar.sh integration
- [/integrate:sepay](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/integrate/sepay): SePay integration

#### Review Commands
- [/review:codebase](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/review/codebase): Codebase review

#### Skill Commands
- [/skill:add](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/commands/skill/add): Add skills

### Engineer Skills

- [Skills Overview](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills): Complete skill reference

#### Frontend Development
- [Next.js](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/nextjs): React framework with SSR/SSG
- [shadcn/ui](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/shadcn-ui): Accessible UI components
- [Tailwind CSS](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/tailwindcss): Utility-first CSS
- [Three.js](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/threejs): 3D graphics
- [UI Styling](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/ui-styling): Styling patterns
- [Web Frameworks](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/web-frameworks): Framework guides
- [Frontend Development](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/frontend-development): Frontend patterns
- [Frontend Design](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/frontend-design): Design implementation
- [Frontend Design Pro](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/frontend-design-pro): Advanced design
- [UI/UX Pro Max](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/ui-ux-pro-max): Professional UI/UX
- [Aesthetic](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/aesthetic): Design aesthetics

#### Backend Development
- [Backend Development](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/backend-development): Server-side patterns

#### Mobile Development
- [Mobile Development](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/mobile-development): Mobile app patterns

#### DevOps & Infrastructure

#### Design & Media
- [Canvas Design](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/canvas-design): Visual design
- [FFmpeg](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/ffmpeg): Video/audio processing
- [ImageMagick](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/imagemagick): Image manipulation
- [Media Processing](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/media-processing): Media handling
- [AI Artist](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/ai-artist): AI art generation
- [AI Multimodal](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/ai-multimodal): Multimodal AI
- [Gemini Vision](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/gemini-vision): Image understanding

#### Development Tools
- [MCP Builder](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/mcp-builder): MCP server creation
- [MCP Management](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/mcp-management): MCP administration
- [Skill Creator](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/skill-creator): Create custom skills
- [Chrome DevTools](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/chrome-devtools): Browser debugging
- [Claude Code Skill](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/claude-code-skill): Claude Code patterns
- [Common Utilities](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/common-utilities): Utility functions
- [Repomix](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/repomix): Repository mixing
- [Template Skill](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/template-skill): Skill templates

#### Problem Solving
- [Systematic Debugging](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/systematic-debugging): Debugging methodology
- [Debugging](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/debugging): Debug patterns
- [Problem Solving](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/problem-solving): Solution strategies

- [Code Review](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/engineer/skills/code-review): Review practices

## Marketing Kit

Complete documentation for the Marketing toolkit with 33 agents, 23 commands, and 21 skills:

- [Marketing Overview](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/marketing): Marketing kit introduction

### Marketing Agents

- [Agents Overview](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/marketing/agents): Complete agent reference

- [planner](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/marketing/agents/planner): Planning

- [Refactoring Code](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/workflows/refactoring-code): Code refactoring

- [Existing Project](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/workflows/existing-project): Existing codebases
- [Maintaining Old Project](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/workflows/maintaining-old-project): Legacy maintenance
- [Understanding Codebases with GKG](https://docs.claudekit.cc/docs/workflows/understanding-codebases-with-gkg): Codebase analysis
